page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT IN OUR AREA
page.content: {LILLIESLEAF}IS A MAINLY AGRICULTURAL AREA IN THE{SCOTTISH BORDERS. HOWEVER BECAUSE OF THE GROWTH OF MACHINERY LOTS OF LOCAL JOBS HAVE DISAPPEARED. THE MOTOR CAR MEANS THAT PEOPLE CAN NOW TRAVEL LONG DISTANCES TO THEIR WORK AND THAT MEANS THE PEOPLE CAN LEAVE THE VILLAGE,AND ALSO COME TO THE VILLAGE, TO WORK. THE NEAREST TOWNS ARE{SELKIRK, HAWICK {GALASHIELS.}90% OF THE PEOPLE GO OUT OF THE VILLAGE TO WORK.THEY TRAVEL BY CAR BECAUSE PUBLIC TRANSPORT IS SO POOR .MOST PEOPLE HAVE TO LEAVE THE VILLAGE BEFORE EIGHT O'CLOCK TO REACH THEIR WORK, RETURNING AFTER FIVE O'CLOCK MOST EVENINGS.A LOT OF PEOPLE GO OUT OF THE VILLAGE TO WORK IN SOME KIND OF MILL.FIVE PEOPLE GO OUT OF THE VILLAGE TO WORK AS SCHOOL TEACHERS.
